holidays.title: Chatham Islands Anniversary Day
holidays.description: Fellow island lovers, brace yourself as we gain more knowledge on your favorite topic.

holidays.title: Lancashire Day
holidays.description: Let’s all take a moment to commemorate the rich history of Lancashire and its parliament.

holidays.title: National Bavarian Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: Whipped or heavy, or both, this celebration will have you licking your fingers all day long.

holidays.title: National Brand Day
holidays.description: If you’re an entrepreneur, this is the day to celebrate your brand.

holidays.title: National Craft Jerky Day
holidays.description: Get ready to chew until you’re blue as we make our own special jerky!

holidays.title: National Lawrence Day
holidays.description: Don’t forget to treat your beloved Lawrence on this special day reserved just for them!

holidays.title: National Sovereignty Day Argentina
holidays.description: Some battles are won with defeat — or so Sovereignty Day tells us.

holidays.title: Pins and Needles Day
holidays.description: You need to put a pin on your calendar because it’s Pins and Needles Day!

holidays.title: Turtle Adoption Day
holidays.description: Turtles are typically bought without notions of the care involved — Turtle Adoption Day sets that right!

holidays.title: Amanda Todd’s Birthday
holidays.description: Todd's story inspired the movement to give more support to anti-bullying organizations.

holidays.title: Bill Nye’s Birthday
holidays.description: This science educator has spent his life sharing important knowledge with his audience.

holidays.title: Blackbear’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a man of many talents and we're celebrating his birthday today!

holidays.title: Bonnie Hoellein’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hoellein launched her YouTube channel and posted her first video on March 26, 2013.

holidays.title: Bruce Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: Martial artist and actor, Bruce Lee had unmatched skills and he's remembered to this day.

holidays.title: Caroline Kennedy’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the majority of her adult life, Kennedy has worked in public relations, law, and politics.

holidays.title: Chanyeol’s Birthday
holidays.description: This South Korean rapper, singer, songwriter, actor and more is making it big in multiple niches.

holidays.title: Golnesa Gharachedaghi’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you're a fan of Golnesa Gharachedaghi, read on to discover interesting details about her.

holidays.title: Jaleel White’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented performer has brought to life many iconic characters throughout his career.

holidays.title: James Avery’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate the legendary career of an inspirational and wildly talented entertainer, actor, and poet.

holidays.title: Jet Jurgensmeyer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jet Jurgensmeyer is a budding actor who also enjoys singing and playing the guitar.

holidays.title: Jimi Hendrix’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock and roll legend created a timeless legacy that will remain immortal.

holidays.title: Ohgeesy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptionally talented rapper has worked hard to create a successful career in the music industry.

holidays.title: Sam Golbach’s Birthday
holidays.description: His livestreams on YouNow have brought laughther and joy to his many fans!

holidays.title: Shaunie O'Neal’s Birthday
holidays.description: Shaunie O'Neal has received a lot of praise for standing for what is right.

holidays.title: Stephanie Soo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Soo’s vlogs, lifestyle videos, and A.S.M.R. videos have become increasingly popular over time.

holidays.title: Twista’s Birthday
holidays.description: Twista, a once Guinness World Record holder, is recognized for rapping in a tongue-twisting, chopper style.

holidays.title: William Fichtner’s Birthday
holidays.description: Read on to learn all about the celebrated and talented actor, William Fichtner.
